name: Minato Bay (Prototype)
description:
An Rpgmaker MZ / MZ3D recreational test run.

Game runs clunky, MZ3D also have pointer lock errors when deployed to mobile.

Lots of plugins available were either not very well made or doesn't work at all,
hence requiring alot of workarounds and modding.

Impossible to run on Firefox (FPS tanked to less than 10) / Safari (does not run at all).
The only browser that ran without issue is Chrome.

Final Verdict: Not Recommended.
